title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting the P1 and P2 projects, I notice that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not available.
EB: The expected behavior is that either both Open Project and Close Project options should be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR: Ensure that the Open/Close Project options are consistently available based on the selected projects.
